price: Na kabla yako hatukuwatuma ila watu wanaume tulio wapa wahyi (ufunuo). Basi waulizeni wenye ilimu ikiwa nyinyi hamjui.
arabic: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا قَبۡلَكَ إِلَّا رِجَالٗا نُّوحِيٓ إِلَيۡهِمۡۖ فَسۡـَٔلُوٓاْ أَهۡلَ ٱلذِّكۡرِ إِن كُنتُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Kabla yako wewe hatukuwatumia watu ila watu wa kibinaadamu vile vile, ambao tuliwafunulia Dini waifikishe kwa watu. Basi, enyi mnao kataa! Waulizeni wanazuoni wajuao ilimu za Vitabu vilivyo teremka, ikiwa nyinyi hamyajui hayo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā arsalnā qablaka illā rijālan nūḥī ilayhim fasalū ahla al-dhik'ri in kuntum lā taʿlamūna
